revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lost Cave |image = [[File:Lost Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Lost Cave. |tokens = 36,000 |location = Sevii Island 5, east of Resort Gorgeous. }} '''Lost Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly|| rowspan=3| [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|40px]] Ruin Maniac Lawson || rowspan=3| [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix, [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler, [[File:Marowak.png|40px]] Marowak |- | [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || rowspan=3| [[File:Psychic (female).png|40px]] Psychic Laura || rowspan=3| [[File:Natu.png|40px]] Natu, [[File:Natu.png|40px]] Natu, [[File:Xatu.png|40px]] Xatu |- | [[File:Murkrow.png|40px]] Murkrow |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center>N/A || [[File:Lady (trainer).png|40px]] Lady Selphy || [[File:Persian.png|40px]] Persian, [[File:Persian.png|40px]] Persian || <center>1,800,000 |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Toxic Plate}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Silk Scarf}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |} </tab> <tab name="Debuff">
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Toxic Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Silk Scarf}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |} </tab> </tabs>
